website_summaries.verdict: These substantially sized and all-natural biscuits use real meaty ingredients for a healthier and tastier treat.
pros: Chunky oven-baked biscuits, free of grains, gluten, corn, wheat, and soy
Excellent choice for dogs suffering with food allergies
cons: Best for medium to larger dog breeds

customer_reviews.title: Pup likes these
customer_reviews.text: My Bernedoodle puppy likes these treats. I personally haven’t tasted them. They aren’t great for training bc it takes too long for her to eat each one. Breaking in half causes crumbling. I reserve these for special rewards.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I like to spoil him
customer_reviews.text: My dog cannot get enough of these! I like to spoil him, but I was told that wet treats aren't good for the dog's teeth on a daily basis. My dog really loves meat and usually refuses anything else. The only dry food he eats is from the Blue line. I was so excited to find these since they're a dry treat that he actually loves! I liked that it's grain free and has few ingredients. Considering how picky my dog is, I would say this is a high-quality dog treat. The only potential downside is that my dog leaves crumbs whenever he eats these, so it's best to feed outside.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: does contain chickn
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to feed these to my dog. I read it and it said grain free no chicken by products....maybe no chicken by products but it has two types of chicken products in the top 5 ingredients. My dog has allergies (gets hot spots) from chicken so all that money down the drain. Had to give away the treats. Just be careful if your dog needs their treats to be Grain and chicken free.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: My dog knows them by name..
customer_reviews.text: My spoiled little rescue Chiweenie loves these!!! She will turn down other brand biscuits..LOL..IF I SAY. "How about a duck biscuit" ...she KNOWS!! Great product..price..delivery
customer_reviews.author: Pants

customer_reviews.title: VERY DECEPTIVE
customer_reviews.text: Very deceptive. Look at how the product is being touted. It says two 100 ounce bags. There is no space after the zero and before the o Blue Buffalo Wilderness Trail Treats Grain Free Duck Dog Biscuits 2/10Ounce Sold by: Monster Pets
customer_reviews.author: Denise Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Dog LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not our dog, a pure breed German Shepard, is allergic to pretty much EVERYTHING but chocolate and she LOVES these treats! Would never buy anything else! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Big Reader

customer_reviews.title: your dog will love them
customer_reviews.text: do not feed them to much they can be fattening for small dogs
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: My dogs don’t care for the taste.
customer_reviews.text: Dogs do not like taste. Love all the other Wilderness products!
customer_reviews.author: SeahawkFan

customer_reviews.title: Good treat
customer_reviews.text: Good treat and reasonably priced and a healthy treat for doggy. She loves them and I can break them into smaller pieces to get the most cooperation for grooming her without giving too many calories.
customer_reviews.author: LuvsWheatens

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my puppy. As anything treat wise for her I taste her treats. I found they did not taste salty like other ones. ( bad for kidneys in my dog's breed). She goes crazy when she hears the package being opened. She is very picky also. I bought two because I wanted a christmas gift for the other bag. My grandma's dogs loved them also !
customer_reviews.author: Donna Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these training treats
customer_reviews.text: Donated to a local rescue that saves dogs from kill shelters and trains them as service dogs . They swear by these traing treats , especially the duck ones . Dogs love them and makes training easier . Dogs happy and trainer is happy . Win , win !!
customer_reviews.author: Esduckie

customer_reviews.title: We like it because it has know artificial ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs have been enjoying this treat every day. We like it because it has know artificial ingredients. Since these are two very high energy dogs it keeps them well maintained . They love these treats.
customer_reviews.author: Marshann Entwhistle

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I feed my 4month old Blue Buffalo Wilderness Grain free large breed and their treats are not disappointing either. My pup loves those and would do anything to get one. I split it in a couple pieces so it will hold longer and I don't give it the whole treat everytime.
customer_reviews.author: RJT

customer_reviews.title: Love Cookie Size
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these cookies but these are so broken up.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Most loved
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and great flavor...or so my pups tell me. Good consistency...yummy treats!
customer_reviews.author: M. ROSS

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: My grand dog is a very picky eater. This is the only treat he gets excited for. Now all the dogs in my neighborhood are eating it too. Neighbors ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Bartell

customer_reviews.title: My dogs have loved every package
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this flavor for my dogs before and they loved it. The order came when promised and the packaging was very good. Oh yeah, my dogs loved these as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pups love 'em. Tried them all. Duck was the favorite!
customer_reviews.author: MadDogFL62

customer_reviews.title: By far our dogs favorite treats - we get her Blue Buffalo yogurt treats too, but these make her dance!
customer_reviews.text: By far our dogs favorite treats - we get her Blue Buffalo yogurt treats too, but these make her dance!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my dog loves these and they are healthy. No by products
customer_reviews.author: minnie mouse

customer_reviews.title: Dogs loved the taste
customer_reviews.text: Biscuits were crushed in the bottom of each package. Dogs loved the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What can i say.... they're deeeelicious ...
customer_reviews.text: What can i say .... they're deeeelicious. and my dog, Secondhand Rosie, likes them, too!
customer_reviews.author: Fredrica C.

customer_reviews.title: Blue Buffalo Wins!
customer_reviews.text: Ms. Jazzy, the Border Collie, loves these treats! She actually creates scenarios in order to be rewarded for her Duck treats!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for grain free
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes these ok, but I'm using all grain free food and snacks and she misses her Milk Bones.
customer_reviews.author: Kathee

customer_reviews.title: Dog Went Back For More!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved them so much. He broke into the bag the first day I had and ate the entire thing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Our older dog loves them.
customer_reviews.text: Our older dog loves these treats as they have that duck taste of the wild and not too hard to chew.
customer_reviews.author: JGB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Repeat customer on this item, my dog loves them and they are very healthy snacks for him.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon E. Wiles

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this treat. They are a little ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this treat. They are a little big so we have to cut them in half which is a chore, but he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: momo

customer_reviews.title: Best Treat Ever
customer_reviews.text: The joy for Tommie starts as soon as I open the box, he recognizes his "Wolf Treats" and starts dancing from there. A very nice addition to his grain and additive free life!
customer_reviews.author: Paulie Walnuts

customer_reviews.title: 2- 10 ounce bags!
customer_reviews.text: Love the treats, but just so you know...... it’s 2 10 ounce bags, not 2 100 ounce bags.
customer_reviews.author: Angie B

customer_reviews.title: They love these!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs get this every night at 7:00 pm, now they know how to tell time. They love these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: Crunchy, yummy goodness for my dogs. They love these grain-free treats.
customer_reviews.author: C. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats. Excellent quality product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: thenautigal

customer_reviews.title: Healthy treats
customer_reviews.text: I like almost anything by Blue Buffalo because the products offer healthy nutrition and treats for my dogs. One of my dogs has allergies and switching to grain free products has made a great difference in her well-being. The dogs love these treats and they are given as something special for extra good behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Odom

customer_reviews.title: They all have better skin, coat
customer_reviews.text: I only use Blue for my 3 rescue dogs and cat. They all have better skin, coat, and allergies are much better!
customer_reviews.author: Jennjennsjeep

customer_reviews.title: received one bag
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. Dogs love them. Only missed a star because I only got one bag, not the two advertised.
customer_reviews.author: RWarnChap

customer_reviews.title: Dogs LOVE These!!
customer_reviews.text: MY DOG and ALL the neighborhood dogs, LOVE THESE!! <3
customer_reviews.author: Monica L. Shank

customer_reviews.title: They loved them.
customer_reviews.text: I walk some dogs in my neighborhood. These I gave as a Christmas gift. They loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves em
customer_reviews.text: We went grain free and the dog doesn't seem to care, except she is most anxious to wait at the treat jar!
customer_reviews.author: Radbadad

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering these treats for my dog, for months and she loves them! Free Grain, which I'm happy too...
customer_reviews.author: Juz Lookin'

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a picky eater who's on a grain free diet and she loves this duck flavor.
customer_reviews.author: winkle3

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy Goodness
customer_reviews.text: Want to give my boxer the very best and these treats are awesome. Good variety to pick from. No problems with stomach issues and my boxer loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog drools for these treats. We give them to her as a special treat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: muttly goofy canines that bound around like happy idiots in the yard
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs. 2 of them are your run of the mill, muttly goofy canines that bound around like happy idiots in the yard, dig holes, howl at ambulances and do dog things. They LOVE these. My little snob, who is the muttliest mixed rescue of them all but thinks she should have her own people bed and drink bottled water just turned up her nose. 2 out of 3 ain't bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Liming

customer_reviews.title: Great Treats but Spendy here
customer_reviews.text: Great treats, but I have no idea why I bought them here, they're way cheaper at PetSmart. My dogs love Blue Buffalo treats though.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: ... as a last resort - does not seem to like for some reason
customer_reviews.text: My dog just took these as a last resort - does not seem to like for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Olin Hughes

product_meta.title: Blue Buffalo Wilderness Trail Treats Grain Free Duck Dog Biscuits 2 Packages - 10 Ounces each
product_meta.description:
Blue Buffalo Wilderness Duck Biscuits Dog Treats (10 oz) are treats made with real duck and full of vitamins and minerals to support your dog's healthy lifestyle. 

Use these Wilderness Duck Biscuit Dog Treats to reward your dog's good behavior. These treats contain vitamins and minerals to support your dog's healthy lifestyle. 
Real Duck
No chicken or poultry by-product meals
No corn, wheat or soy products
No artificial preservatives, colors, or flavors
feature_bullets: Made with the finest natural ingredients
No chicken or poultry by-product meals
